pytket.pyquil¶

Module for conversion between Rigetti pyQuil and \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) primitives.

pytket.pyquil.pyquil_to_tk(prog: pyquil.quil.Program) → pytket._circuit.Circuit¶

Convert a pyquil.Program to a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit . Note that not all pyQuil operations are currently supported by pytket.

Return type

Circuit

Parameters

prog (Program) – A circuit to be converted

Returns

The converted circuit

pytket.pyquil.tk_to_pyquil(tkcirc: Union[pytket._circuit.Circuit, pytket._routing.PhysicalCircuit], active_reset: bool = False) → pyquil.quil.Program¶

Convert a \(\mathrm{t|ket}\rangle\) Circuit to a pyquil.Program .

Return type

Program

Parameters

tkcirc – A circuit to be converted

Returns

The converted circuit
